data.title: Valve Corporation - News on games, Steam and more
data.meta_description: Here's the latest on video game development company Valve Corporation - from
data.text:
Why my Steam Deck got thrown in the bin and I closed my Steam account – Reader’s Feature

A reader tells a complex and distressing story of incompetent delivery people and lost tempers when dealing with Steam customer support.

Win a free OLED Steam Deck just by watching The Game Awards tonight

Valve is offering up to 100 Steam Deck portables during The Game Awards event on Thursday night, in a free lottery that anyone can enter.

Valve giving up being a developer is the greatest tragedy in video games – Reader’s Feature

A reader is upset that Gabe Newell’s recent comments about game development underline how long it is since he’s made anything new.

Xbox Series X and Starfield have failed but I know what Microsoft will try next – Reader’s Feature

A reader examines the recent sales results for Xbox and predicts that Microsoft will now refocus on PC gaming and trying to take on Valve.

Steam Deck 2 could be out by 2025 says Valve as OLED model revealed

A new OLED model for the Steam Deck is out in less than a week, but the true successor is still a couple of years away at least.

Counter-Strike 2 is now the worst rated Valve game ever

Valve's remake of the classic shooter has seen a sharp influx of negative reviews on Steam since launch.

Valve officially launches Counter-Strike 2 as Global Offensive ceases to exist

After 11 years and a fairly smooth beta test, Counter Strike gets a face-lift and a new engine.

Half-Life 3 rumours begin again thanks to Gamescom – and they might just be true

Valve will be attending Gamescom this year so of course there are rumours of it announcing Half-Life 3 or its mystery Neon Prime game.

It’s time for physical video game sales to die and I’m not sorry – Reader’s Feature

A reader looks back at the history of digital video games and explains there’s little point in having physical copies anymore.

Left 4 Dead 3 is probably not happening warns lead writer

Datamined references to a new Left 4 Dead game are not what they seem says series writer Chet Faliszek.

Steam is banning games with AI generated art claims developer

Unless developers can prove they have the rights for the assets used to train them, Valve has begun refusing to accept AI content on Steam.

When is Starfield released and will it run on Steam Deck?

As the release date of Starfield draws near, you're probably itching to know when you can jump into the game.

Nintendo Dolphin emulator blocked on Steam before it’s even launched

After receiving warnings of legal action from Nintendo, Valve has deleted the Steam listing for the Dolphin emulator.

Steam Deck rival Asus ROG Ally is more powerful but the same price

The latest attempt at an alternative to Steam Deck seems to have it all, with a powerful AMD Z1 Extreme chip for just $700.

Portal 3 talk was just a joke says original writer

Hopes that Valve might finally make a Portal 3 have been dashed, at least in terms of the original writer being involved.

Fans hope for Portal 3 as LinkedIn profiles reveal ‘ambitious’ new Valve game

As another new Valve game is rumoured to be in the works, fans debate whether it’ll actually come out.

Left 4 Dead 3 leaked again by Counter Strike 2

Half-Life 3 may remain a myth but more evidence of a Left 4 Dead 3 is circulating online thanks to Counter Strike 2.
